metaTitle: Christmas Elf Set | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Our Christmas Elf Set includes your very own elf, a personalised letter from Father Christmas, 1 Official Elf Report and 1 Christmas Elf Contract. Buy online now!

product.title: Christmas Elf Set
product.caption: The Elf Set
info: The elf is approx 11 inches long and complies with EN71 / CE safety regulations. The product is suitable from the age of 3+ due to small parts. Adult supervision is required.
product.smallPrint: Please note these elf's are intended as an occasional/decorative toy.
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice). The double elf set option comes in one box and contains 1 boy and 1 girl elf plus 1 letter, 2 Official Elf Reports and 2 Christmas Elf Contracts. If you wish to change this combination, please contact us via email before purchase
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.
